biotools.summary: EpiVIA is joint profiling of chromatin accessibility and CAR-T integration site analysis at population and single-cell levels. EpiVIA parses each read and identifies the chimeric fragments, which are further classified into different categories based on how the read pair is aligned to the combined reference genome.
